Title: Fair
Review: The quality of fablic is just satisfactory.  The stapling done for fixing the fabric to wood is very poor. Some of staples has already  loose. The quality is not of duroflex brand. With respect to quality, finish of the product, i think 10K is more.

Title: Just okay
Review: Reclining mechanism is good. Cushion seems good and enough.The only problem I have with it is the poor quality of fabric used. The fabric is rough and causes itching to skin. It ruins the whole experience.

Review: Very comfortable to sit..but leg rest should hv been bit long.
